name: Fidelity D&D Bancorp, Inc.
description: Fidelity D&D Bancorp, Inc. is a financial holding company that operates through its primary subsidiary, Fidelity Deposit and Discount Bank. Founded in 1903 and headquartered in Dunmore, Pennsylvania, the company provides a full range of banking services to individuals and businesses. Fidelity D&D is committed to delivering exceptional customer service and innovative financial solutions tailored to meet the needs of its clients. The bank offers various products, including personal and commercial banking, loans, mortgages, and wealth management services. With a strong emphasis on community involvement, Fidelity D&D actively supports local initiatives and organizations, reinforcing its reputation as a trusted partner in the region. The company has grown steadily over the years, expanding its branch network and enhancing its digital banking capabilities to serve customers better. By leveraging technology, Fidelity D&D aims to provide convenient and secure banking experiences while maintaining the personal touch that has characterized its service for over a century. The bank is dedicated to fostering financial literacy and empowering customers to achieve their financial goals, positioning itself as a leader in the community banking sector.

seo.meta_title: Fidelity D&D Bancorp, Inc. | Community Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Fidelity D&D Bancorp, Inc., your trusted partner in community banking, offering a wide range of financial services and personalized solutions.

faq.question: What services does Fidelity D&D Bancorp offer?
faq.answer: Fidelity D&D Bancorp offers personal and commercial banking, loans, mortgages, and wealth management services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Fidelity D&D Bancorp?
faq.answer: Daniel J. Santaniello is the CEO of Fidelity D&D Bancorp, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Fidelity D&D Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: Fidelity D&D Bancorp is headquartered in Dunmore, Pennsylvania, USA.

faq.question: When was Fidelity D&D Bancorp founded?
faq.answer: Fidelity D&D Bancorp was founded in 1903.
